Serialized Form

  • Package MapObjects

    • Class MapObjects.Animal extends Interactable implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • curDir

          Direction curDir
          Current Direction of the Animal

        • speed

          int speed
          Speed of the Animal

    • Class MapObjects.Interactable extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • xLocation

          int xLocation
          The x-location of the object

        • yLocation

          int yLocation
          The y-location of the object

        • width

          int width
          The width of the object

        • height

          int height
          The height of the object

        • relativeCollisionBox

          java.awt.Rectangle relativeCollisionBox
          The collision box used by the object. Definition is relative to the 0,0 position of the object.

    • Class MapObjects.Litter extends Interactable implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • imgID

          int imgID
          Number generated randomly that later maps to A SpriteID to paint it with.

        • lType

          LitterType lType
          Enum from LitterType that represents the type of Litter this object is

    • Class MapObjects.Plant extends Interactable implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • health

          int health

    • Class MapObjects.Receptacle extends Interactable implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • rType

          ReceptacleType rType
          The type of Receptacle this object is.

  • Package MVC

    • Class MVC.Model extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • player

          Player player
          The only controllable object in the game.
          See Also:
          Player

        • spacePressed

          boolean spacePressed
          Whether the space key is currently pressed down.

        • crabDirection

          int crabDirection
          The current movement direction of the Model.crab.

        • tBin

          Receptacle tBin
          The trash bin

        • rBin

          Receptacle rBin
          The recycle bin

        • crab

          Animal crab
          The Crab, currently the only Animal in the game.

        • animals

          java.util.HashSet<E> animals
          Every animal in the world. Currently only the crab.

        • animalXIncr

          int animalXIncr
          The horizontal speed of the Crab

        • animalYIncr

          int animalYIncr
          The vertical speed of the Crab

        • playerMove

          boolean playerMove
          Whether the player is allowed to move this frame. Set to false under specific circumstances, i.e. when colliding with an Animal

        • score

          int score
          The current game score

        • pickedUp

          Litter pickedUp
          The last Litter to be picked up by the Model.player

        • animalEatenLitter

          Litter animalEatenLitter
          The last Litter to be picked up by an animal

        • plants

          java.util.ArrayList<E> plants
          Contains plant objects

        • randPlant

          int randPlant
          Random index of next plant

        • gamePhase

          GamePhase gamePhase
          The current game phase

    • Class MVC.View extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • frame

          javax.swing.JFrame frame
          The JFrame housing this View.

        • pickedUpLitter

          Litter pickedUpLitter
          The litter currently being help by the player, or null.

        • hasLitter

          boolean hasLitter
          Whether the player is holding on to litter

        • plants

          java.util.ArrayList<E> plants
          Contains all plant objects onscreen

        • score

          int score
          The current score of the game

        • tGlowCount

          int tGlowCount
          The number of frames that the trash bin has been glowing

        • rGlowCount

          int rGlowCount
          The number of frames that the recycle bin has been glowing

        • gamePhase

          GamePhase gamePhase
          The current phase of the game

  • Package Player

    • Class Player.Player extends Interactable implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • dx

          int dx
          Horizontal movement direction. -1 for moving left, 0 for horizontally stable (initial value), 1 for moving right.

        • dy

          int dy
          Vertical movement direction. -1 for moving up, 0 for vertically stable (initial value), 1 for moving down.

        • direction

          Direction direction
          Movement direction. Gets recalculated when Player.dx and Player.dy are changed to match their behaviour. Initial value is EAST.

        • status

          PlayerStatus status
          Player status, i.e. IDLE or WALKING, etc. Gets recalculated when Player.dx and Player.dy are changed to match their behaviour. Initial value is IDLE.
